doc.field: HOUSING AGENCY CMO BOND ISSUE PRICED

- A three-part, 160 mln dlr offering of Virginia Housing Development Authority collateralized mortgage obligations was priced, First Boston Corp said as a manager. The package includes 84 mln dlrs of CMOs with an average life of 1.1 years priced to yield 6.88 pct and 23.5 mln dlrs of bonds with a 5.5 year average life and eight pct return. Rounding out the financing is a 52.5 mln dlr tranche of floating rate CMOs. These offer a return at the three-month Libor rate plus 45 basis points. Standard and Poor's rates all of the securities AAA.
